scripts.build: npm run build:back && npm run build:app && npm run build:beaconer
scripts.build:back: npm run build:webserver && npm run build:client && npm run build:beacon && npm run build:content && npm run build:logger
scripts.test: npm run test:back && npm run test:app && npm run test:beaconer
scripts.start:app: npm run start:auth && npm run start:client && npm run start:beacon && npm run start:content && npm run start:webserver
scripts.start:back: npm run start:webserver && npm run start:client && npm run start:beacon && npm run start:content && npm run start:logger
scripts.build:webserver: docker build -f $(pwd)/back/microservices/webserver/webserver.Dockerfile --tag $(sh scripts/read_env_var.sh DOCKER_USERNAME)/webserver:$(sh scripts/read_env_var.sh PROJECT_VERSION) --build-arg GIT=$(sh scripts/read_env_var.sh GIT) --build-arg API_PORT=$(sh scripts/read_env_var.sh API_PORT) .
scripts.start:webserver: docker run -d -p $(sh scripts/read_env_var.sh API_PORT):$(sh scripts/read_env_var.sh API_PORT) $(sh scripts/read_env_var.sh DOCKER_USERNAME)/webserver:$(sh scripts/read_env_var.sh PROJECT_VERSION)
scripts.build:client: docker build -f $(pwd)/back/microservices/client/client.Dockerfile --tag $(sh scripts/read_env_var.sh DOCKER_USERNAME)/client:$(sh scripts/read_env_var.sh PROJECT_VERSION) --build-arg GIT=$(sh scripts/read_env_var.sh GIT) .
scripts.start:client: docker run -d $(sh scripts/read_env_var.sh DOCKER_USERNAME)/client:$(sh scripts/read_env_var.sh PROJECT_VERSION)
scripts.build:beacon: docker build -f $(pwd)/back/microservices/beacon/beacon.Dockerfile --tag $(sh scripts/read_env_var.sh DOCKER_USERNAME)/beacon:$(sh scripts/read_env_var.sh PROJECT_VERSION) --build-arg GIT=$(sh scripts/read_env_var.sh GIT) .
scripts.start:beacon: docker run -d $(sh scripts/read_env_var.sh DOCKER_USERNAME)/beacon:$(sh scripts/read_env_var.sh PROJECT_VERSION)
scripts.build:content: docker build -f $(pwd)/back/microservices/content/content.Dockerfile --tag $(sh scripts/read_env_var.sh DOCKER_USERNAME)/content:$(sh scripts/read_env_var.sh PROJECT_VERSION) --build-arg GIT=$(sh scripts/read_env_var.sh GIT) .
scripts.start:content: docker run -d $(sh scripts/read_env_var.sh DOCKER_USERNAME)/content:$(sh scripts/read_env_var.sh PROJECT_VERSION)
scripts.build:auth: docker build -f $(pwd)/back/microservices/auth/auth.Dockerfile --tag $(sh scripts/read_env_var.sh DOCKER_USERNAME)/auth:$(sh scripts/read_env_var.sh PROJECT_VERSION) --build-arg GIT=$(sh scripts/read_env_var.sh GIT) .
scripts.start:auth: docker run -d $(sh scripts/read_env_var.sh DOCKER_USERNAME)/auth:$(sh scripts/read_env_var.sh PROJECT_VERSION)
scripts.build:logger: docker build -f $(pwd)/back/microservices/logger/logger.Dockerfile --tag $(sh scripts/read_env_var.sh DOCKER_USERNAME)/logger:$(sh scripts/read_env_var.sh PROJECT_VERSION) --build-arg GIT=$(sh scripts/read_env_var.sh GIT) .
scripts.start:logger: docker run logger -d $(sh scripts/read_env_var.sh DOCKER_USERNAME)/logger:$(sh scripts/read_env_var.sh PROJECT_VERSION)
